attributes.action: Micah Richards for England EURO 2012 squad
attributes.additional_details:
HM Government should use its powers of persuasion to get England national football team manager Roy Hodgson to call up Micah Richards to the Euro 2012 squad.

Micah Richards is a remarkably good football player - a Premier League winning defender no less - and would deserve his place in the squad ahead of others selected.

The petition acknowledges that Roy Hodgson and not a Government Minister picks the squad, as is right, but contends that given the gravity of his mistakenness in this matter, a word in the ear would not go amiss.
